article.title: General Dynamics Awarded $11 Million Contract by Defense Information Systems Agency
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: General Dynamics Information Technology has been awarded a follow-on contract from the Defense Information Systems Agency (DISA) to support the Systems Integration Communications Infrastructure Support program. The contract is valued at $10.9 million over a five-year period. General Dynamics will provide engineering solutions and network and information-system implementation and upgrades for DISA computing services.
